name: HTTPS Everywhere - Hide Counter
description: Hide the "number of rules matched" counter that the HTTPS Everywhere toolbar button started forcibly displaying a few versions ago.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.

additional_info:
- Remove distracting clutter that you don't need 99% of the time and can 
  check by clicking the icon when you do need it.
- Restore a professional look to your Firefox toolbar
  (seriously, why didn't they use the normal way to display a counter?)
